name: svelte-view-split
description: Create resizable views (panels) in Svelte applications.

# svelte-view-split Create resizible views (panels) in svelte. **Features:** - Size is less than 2 kb - Support both horizontal and vertical splits - Support multiple splits - Support lifecyle functions - Support min and max sizes - Support custom divider size - Support for legacy browser such as IE 11 ## Basic Example In order for the below example to work correctly, the classname `view-split` needs to have `display: flex`. ```svelte
